source: TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_SEQ_00<tab>Matoya is in a mood to reminisce.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_SEQ_00<tab>マトーヤの洞窟のマトーヤは、言いたいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_SEQ_01<tab>Matoya shares with you the tale of her work on a device known as an aetheric converger, and how it led to a bitter falling-out between her and her peers. The fruits of her research were apparently compiled within a tome which now lies sealed within the Great Gubal Library, and you must overcome the dangers within if you wish to retrieve it. Ask Matoya for further instructions.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_SEQ_01<tab>マトーヤから、エーテル収束器の話を聞いた。エーテル収束器に関する論文が、グブラ幻想図書館に封印されているそうだ。マトーヤの洞窟の「マトーヤ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_SEQ_02<tab>Matoya loans you one of her servants to guide you to the Great Library and unlock its long-sealed doors. Make yourself known to this servant─a broom.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_SEQ_02<tab>マトーヤから話を聞いた。グブラ幻想図書館の扉を、彼女の使い魔が開けてくれるという。マトーヤの洞窟の「魔法仕掛けのホウキ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_SEQ_03<tab>Having introduced himself as Broomsy, the surprisingly eloquent sweeping implement furnishes you with directions to the Great Library. Upon leaving Matoya's Cave, you are to make your way east; the library building will come into view upon gaining the collapsed bridge. Speak with Broomsy when you arrive, and he will unlock the door for you.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_SEQ_03<tab>魔法仕掛けのホウキと話した。グブラ幻想図書館は、マトーヤの洞窟の東にあるそうだ。低地ドラヴァニアのグブラ幻想図書館付近にいる「魔法仕掛けのホウキ」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_SEQ_04The Great Gubal Library is ready to receive its first visitors in fifteen years. Brave the dangers within and retrieve Matoya's tome.

※The Great Gubal Library can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_SEQ_04魔法仕掛けのホウキが、グブラ幻想図書館の扉を開いてくれた。「禁書回収 グブラ幻想図書館」を攻略しよう。

※コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加できます。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_SEQ_05<tab>You have survived the trials within the Great Gubal Library. Make your way back to the outside world.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_SEQ_05<tab>「禁書回収 グブラ幻想図書館」を攻略した。低地ドラヴァニアに戻ろう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_SEQ_06<tab>Upon defeating the library's final guardian, the Crystal of Water regains the power of the Light. Soon after, you find what you can only assume is Matoya's tome on the aetheric converger. Bear the book back to Matoya, who awaits you within her cave.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_SEQ_06<tab>グブラ幻想図書館の守護者を倒したところ、水属性の光のクリスタルが輝きを取り戻した。その直後、冒険者はエーテル収束器について書かれた論文と思しき書物を発見した。マトーヤの洞窟のマトーヤに「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8AA701 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_SEQ_07<tab>Matoya confirms that you have retrieved the correct tome. All that remains is to put the knowledge it contains to use.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_SEQ_07<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8AA701 /var>を、マトーヤに渡した。冒険者が論文を探しにいっている間、ヤ・シュトラとアルフィノも苦労をしていたようだ。さっそく、論文を確認してみよう。
TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_SEQ_08<tab>

TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_TODO_00<tab>マトーヤと話す
TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_TODO_01<tab>魔法仕掛けのホウキと話す

source: TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Broomsy at the Great Gubal Library.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_TODO_02<tab>グブラ幻想図書館付近の魔法仕掛けのホウキと話す
TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_TODO_03<tab>「禁書回収 グブラ幻想図書館」を攻略する
TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_TODO_04<tab>「禁書回収 グブラ幻想図書館」を攻略する
TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_TODO_05<tab>マトーヤの洞窟のマトーヤに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8AA701 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_YSHTOLA_000_000<tab>Being here calls to mind my days studying under Matoya. Though she was the strictest─and most irascible─of mentors, she led by example and inspired one to greater heights. Were it not for her sage guidance, I should not be the woman I am.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_YSHTOLA_000_000「マトーヤの洞窟」に来ると、見習いだったころを思い出すわ。
何年前のことなのか、何歳頃のことなのか……
決して言うつもりはないわよ？

source: TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_ALPHINAUD_000_000<tab>Do you see the tomes lying about like so many cheap romances? They are <var 1A 02 /var>priceless<var 1A 01 /var>. My professors at the Studium would have fits if they saw them in this state.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_ALPHINAUD_000_000)) (( )) 02 /var>、ここはすごい場所だぞ。
無造作に置かれてる書は、どれも一級品のものばかり……
本国のシャーレアン魔法大学の蔵書にも匹敵するくらいさ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_MATOYA_000_010<tab>Oh, the Great Library's guardians shouldn't pose any difficulty for a hero like you. You'll hardly notice Shtola's absence. And the girl...boy─whatever─would only get in your way.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_MATOYA_000_010あんたの腕なら、シュトラの助けを借りなくても、
禁書庫の守護兵を倒せるだろうさ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_MATOYA_000_011<tab>But if it turns out you aren't up to the task... Well, then I'll know you can't be trusted with something as dangerous as an aetheric ram.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_MATOYA_000_011そうでなければ、とてもじゃないが、
「エーテル収束器」のような危険な代物を任せられない。
婆があたえた試練だと思って、行っておいで。

source:
TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_MATOYA_000_012Now, the library's entrance is locked tight. I'll loan you one of my servants to open it─the broom yonder.
...Well? What are you waiting for? Introduce yourself, !
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_MATOYA_000_012「グブラ幻想図書館」の扉は固く閉ざされているだろうが、
カギ代わりに、ワシの使い魔を一体貸してやろう。
そこの「魔法仕掛けのホウキ」に声をかけるこったね。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_MATOYA_000_013<tab>Are you going to introduce yourself to that broom or not? No skin off my nose if you don't.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_MATOYA_000_013入口の扉は固く閉ざされているだろうが、
カギ代わりに、ワシの使い魔を一体貸してやろう。
そこの「魔法仕掛けのホウキ」に声をかけるこったね。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_YSHTOLA_000_014<tab>The Great Library was more than just a repository for tomes; it also served as a center of research for countless fields of study.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_YSHTOLA_000_014「グブラ幻想図書館」は、蔵書の保管だけでなく、
エーテル学を始めとする、
さまざまな学問の研究の場でもあったの。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_YSHTOLA_000_015<tab>Fields such as the development of arcane entities, the fruits of which were employed as the library's sentinels. Be ever on your guard, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_YSHTOLA_000_015今も、研究の成果である魔法生物が、
守護兵として護り続けているはずだから、気をつけて……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_ALPHINAUD_000_016<tab>Would that I could accompany you to the Great Library, but I sense it would be unwise to go against my lady's wishes. Rest assured, I mean to use my time here productively, gleaning all that I can from our learned host. (Even if the old crone can't tell boy from girl...)
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_ALPHINAUD_000_016同行できないのは残念だが、
「マトーヤ」老に教えを請えるいい機会だ。
君の役に立てるよう、魔法の勉強をしておくよ。
TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_MAGICALBROOM01660_000_017<tab>フシギナ、ホウキ、サ、サッサカサ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_MAGICALBROOM01660_000_020<tab>Greetings, good <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. I am Broomsy, my lady's servant of some fifty years. May I say what an honor it is to serve you!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_MAGICALBROOM01660_000_020ハジメ、マシテデ、サッサカサ！
ワタクシ、マトーヤ様より、冒険者サマの案内を、
仰せつかりました、この道、50年の使い魔でゴザイマス！

source: TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_MAGICALBROOM01660_000_021<tab>I am given to understand you wish to enter the Great Gubal Library. To find it, pray head east upon leaving this cave. The building will come into view shortly after you reach the collapsed bridge.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_MAGICALBROOM01660_000_021さあさあ、サッサと参りまショウ。
「グブラ幻想図書館」は、洞窟をでて東に進んだ先。
崩落した橋を登れば、すぐに見えるはずデス！

source: TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_MAGICALBROOM01660_000_022<tab>I shall go on ahead and await you at the entrance. When your preparations are in order, pray come and meet me there. It will be my pleasure to unlock the door for you.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_MAGICALBROOM01660_000_022入口でお声がけいただければ、
ワタクシが、ササッと扉を解錠いたしまショウ！
ではでは、ゴキゲンヨウ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_MATOYA_000_023<tab>What are you loitering around here for? Hurry up and fetch that book!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_MATOYA_000_023こんなところで油を売ってるんじゃないよ！
さっさと禁書庫に行っておいで！

source: TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_MAGICALBROOM01660_000_030<tab>You stand before the Great Gubal Library, one of Hydaelyn's foremost repositories of knowledge.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_MAGICALBROOM01660_000_030マッテ、イマシタ、サッサカサ！
こちらがかの有名な「グブラ幻想図書館」でゴザイマス！

source: TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_MAGICALBROOM01660_000_031<tab>Alas, it has fallen into disuse since the exodus some summers since. In all those years, its halls have welcomed not the coming of a single soul─its floors felt not the loving brush of a broom...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_MAGICALBROOM01660_000_03115年前に放棄されて以来、
ホウキも入らぬ状態で、荒れ放題の散らかり放題。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_MAGICALBROOM01660_000_032<tab>M-Mine apologies, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>! Pray pay no mind to the dreams of a humble broom. You are doubtless eager to venture within and retrieve my lady's tome. I shall unlock the door at once. When you have what you seek, pray return to the cave and report to my lady.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_MAGICALBROOM01660_000_032ササッと扉を開けますから、
サッサと「エーテル収束器の論文」をお探しくだサイ！
見つかりましたら、「マトーヤ」様にご報告ヲ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_MAGICALBROOM01660_000_033<tab>I wish you good fortune in your search. When you have what you seek, pray return to the cave and report to my lady.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_MAGICALBROOM01660_000_033サッサと「エーテル収束器の論文」をお探しくだサイ！
見つかりましたら、「マトーヤ」様にご報告ヲ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_MATOYA_000_040<tab>I take it you found the tome. Well, let's see it, then.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_MATOYA_000_040おや、もう戻ったのかい。
例の論文は見つかったんだろうね？

source:
TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_MATOYA_000_041Aye, this is it all right...
Shtola! Boy! Put down whatever you're doing and come here! )) (( )) 02 /var> has returned with the tome!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_MATOYA_000_041よしよし、上出来だよ。
これがなくちゃ、始まるモンも始まらないからね。
さあ、シュトラ、坊主、仕事は終いだよ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_YSHTOLA_000_042<tab>Thank the gods. But another minute under Master Matoya's exacting supervision, and I would certainly have lost my mind─or mayhap merely my temper. Some things never change indeed...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_YSHTOLA_000_042)) (( )) 02 /var>が、
早く帰ってきてくれて、助かったわ。
マトーヤの人使いの荒さは、昔っから変わらないんだもの。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_ALPHINAUD_000_043<tab>Well, I for one appreciate the exacting supervision. In the short while we have been here, I feel I have gained a far better understanding of arcane entities than I did during my entire time at the Studium.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_ALPHINAUD_000_043確かに苦労しました。
でも、マトーヤ様の素晴らしい指導を受けられたお陰で、
魔法生物に関して、良い勉強になりましたよ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_ALPHINAUD_000_044<tab>Should the opportunity present itself, I should very much like to employ this knowledge for the betterment of mankind─create a new variety of Carbuncle, perhaps...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_ALPHINAUD_000_044ここで得た知識を、自分なりに応用することで、
新しいカーバンクルだって作れそうな気がします。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_MATOYA_000_045<tab>Don't get ahead of yourself, boy. Louisoix's grandson or no, it'll take another decade under me before you can call yourself a scholar, and a deal more than that to make you a scholar worth a damn.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_MATOYA_000_045フン、調子に乗るんじゃないよ。
ルイゾワの孫だけあって、多少は筋がいいが……
一人前になりたきゃ、ワシの下で10年は修行するんだね。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_YSHTOLA_000_046<tab>As you may have gathered, Master Matoya is not easily impressed.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_YSHTOLA_000_046ふふふ、弱冠11才で、
シャーレアン魔法大学に入学を許された俊英も、
マトーヤの前では形無しね。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_ALPHINAUD_000_047<tab>...Indeed. Ahem. So, uh...<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> has returned with the tome, has <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> not? Shall we examine it?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_ALPHINAUD_000_047やれやれ、まいったな……。
さ、さあ、早く論文を確認しましょう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_YSHTOLA_000_048<tab>You have the tome, yes? Then hurry and show it to Matoya that I might be free of her stifling attention.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_YSHTOLA_000_048おかえりなさい、)) (( )) 02 /var>。
その様子だと、無事に論文を手に入れられたようね。
こっちは、マトーヤの手伝いで、てんてこ舞いよ……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_ALPHINAUD_000_049<tab>At the Studium, I had the good fortune to be tutored by some of the finest scholars in Sharlayan. I can safely say, however, that Master Matoya exceeds them all. How I should have liked to listen to her arguing with my grandfather...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA611_01660_ALPHINAUD_000_049マトーヤ様の言葉は、ひとつひとつが宝石のようだ。
使い魔の生成の手伝いを通して、
魔法生物に関する知識が、一段と深まったよ。
